nodes.documentation: @dev Treasury manages the Dai, interacting with MakerDAO's vat and chai when needed.
nodes.name: Treasury

nodes.documentation: @dev Disables pulling and pushing. To be called only by shutdown management contracts.
nodes.name: shutdown
debt

nodes.documentation:
@dev Returns the Treasury borrowing capacity from MakerDAO, as the collateral posted times the collateralization ratio for Weth.
 We can borrow (ink * spot)
nodes.name: power

nodes.documentation: @dev Returns the amount of Dai in this contract.
nodes.name: savings

nodes.documentation: @dev Pays as much system debt as possible from the Treasury dai balance, saving the rest as chai.
nodes.name: pushDai

nodes.documentation: @dev Pays as much system debt as possible from the Treasury chai balance, saving the rest as chai.
nodes.name: pushChai

nodes.documentation: @dev Returns dai using chai savings as much as possible, and borrowing the rest.
nodes.name: pullDai

nodes.documentation: @dev Returns chai using chai savings as much as possible, and borrowing the rest.
nodes.name: pullChai

nodes.documentation: @dev Moves all Weth collateral from Treasury into Maker
nodes.name: pushWeth

nodes.documentation: @dev Moves Weth collateral from Treasury controlled Maker Eth vault to `to` address.
nodes.name: pullWeth

nodes.documentation:
@dev Moves dai debt and weth collateral from Treasury to `user` in MakerDAO
 Needs to be surrounded by `vat.hope(treasury.address)` and `vat.nope(treasury.address)`
 Only the Dealer can call `transferPosition`, to avoid transferring more debt than an user has.
 The `dai` parameter is measured in normalized dai, not in the units used in `vat.urns(ilk, user)).art`.
nodes.name: fork

nodes.documentation: @dev Registers the one contract that will shut down the Treasury if MakerDAO shuts down.
nodes.name: registerDssShutdown

nodes.documentation: @dev Treasury manages the Dai, interacting with MakerDAO's vat and chai when needed.
nodes.name: Treasury

nodes.documentation: @dev Disables pulling and pushing. To be called only by shutdown management contracts.
nodes.name: shutdown

@dev Returns the Treasury borrowing capacity from MakerDAO, as the collateral posted times the collateralization ratio for Weth.
 We can borrow (ink * spot)

nodes.documentation: @dev Returns the amount of Dai in this contract.

nodes.documentation: @dev Pays as much system debt as possible from the Treasury dai balance, saving the rest as chai.

nodes.documentation: @dev Pays as much system debt as possible from the Treasury chai balance, saving the rest as chai.
nodes.name: pushChai

nodes.documentation: @dev Returns dai using chai savings as much as possible, and borrowing the rest.
nodes.name: pullDai

nodes.documentation: @dev Returns chai using chai savings as much as possible, and borrowing the rest.
nodes.name: pullChai

nodes.documentation: @dev Moves all Weth collateral from Treasury into Maker
nodes.name: pushWeth

nodes.documentation: @dev Moves Weth collateral from Treasury controlled Maker Eth vault to `to` address.
nodes.name: pullWeth

nodes.documentation:
@dev Moves dai debt and weth collateral from Treasury to `user` in MakerDAO
 Needs to be surrounded by `vat.hope(treasury.address)` and `vat.nope(treasury.address)`
 Only the Dealer can call `transferPosition`, to avoid transferring more debt than an user has.
 The `dai` parameter is measured in normalized dai, not in the units used in `vat.urns(ilk, user)).art`.
nodes.name: fork

nodes.documentation: @dev Registers the one contract that will shut down the Treasury if MakerDAO shuts down.
nodes.name: registerDssShutdown

devdoc.details: Treasury manages the Dai, interacting with MakerDAO's vat and chai when needed.

debt().details: Returns the Treasury debt towards MakerDAO, as the dai borrowed times the stability fee for Weth. We have borrowed (rate * art) Borrowing Limit (rate * art) <= (ink * spot)

fork(address,uint256,uint256).details: Moves dai debt and weth collateral from Treasury to `user` in MakerDAO Needs to be surrounded by `vat.hope(treasury.address)` and `vat.nope(treasury.address)` Only the Dealer can call `transferPosition`, to avoid transferring more debt than an user has. The `dai` parameter is measured in normalized dai, not in the units used in `vat.urns(ilk, user)).art`.

grantAccess(address).details: Add user to the authorized users list

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

power().details: Returns the Treasury borrowing capacity from MakerDAO, as the collateral posted times the collateralization ratio for Weth. We can borrow (ink * spot)

pullChai(address,uint256).details: Returns chai using chai savings as much as possible, and borrowing the rest.

pullDai(address,uint256).details: Returns dai using chai savings as much as possible, and borrowing the rest.

pullWeth(address,uint256).details: Moves Weth collateral from Treasury controlled Maker Eth vault to `to` address.

pushChai().details: Pays as much system debt as possible from the Treasury chai balance, saving the rest as chai.

pushDai().details: Pays as much system debt as possible from the Treasury dai balance, saving the rest as chai.

pushWeth().details: Moves all Weth collateral from Treasury into Maker

registerDssShutdown(address).details: Registers the one contract that will shut down the Treasury if MakerDAO shuts down.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner.     * NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

revokeAccess(address).details: Remove user to the authorized users list

savings().details: Returns the amount of Dai in this contract.

shutdown().details: Disables pulling and pushing. To be called only by shutdown management contracts.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.
